FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI

Class ShowRectangle2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI.ShowRectangle2D

  • public class ShowRectangle2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for the rectangles representing shows on the canvas. This class contains the code for drawing rectangles and stores the show as a single variable.

    This show contains a Rectangle2D. This rectangle represents a show on the timeline Canvas given to draw it on. Inside the rectangle text is drawn. This text shows the name and the artist of the show this rectangle represents.

                       double width,
                       double height,
                       Show show)
        Constructor for ShowRectangle2D.

        Creates a new Rectangle2D instance based on the given parameters.

        Parameters:
        minX - start x-coordinate for the rectangle2D
        minY - start y-coordinate for the rectangle2D
        width - width for the rectangle2D
        height - height for the rectangle2D
        show - the Show that this rectangle represents
